text: The Australian Academy of Science is the highest institution for sciences in Australia. It was established in 1954. The academy is based in Canberra in the Shine Dome building beside the Australian National University campus. The academy is modelled after the Royal Society and operates under a Royal Charter. It is independent from the government. The purpose of the academy is to promote science and science education in Australia. == References == == Other websites == *Australian Academy of Science *Australian Academy of Science Building Category:Buildings and structures in Canberra Category:National academies of sciences Category:1954 establishments Category:Organisations based in Australia Category:Australian National Heritage List Category:1950s establishments in Australia
title: Australian Academy of Science
